WRITING.TEXT: That last stitch had to feel soooo good.

WRITING.TITLE: Shredding papers at work and not being able to feed the machine in time, so the automatic motor ends up shutting off. This is all I can think of.
Pizza toppings: below or on top of the cheese?
WRITING.TEXT: I was making pizza at home and realized I put the pepperonis below the cheese, but typically when you order takeout, they are on top. Is there a difference? I feel like this could be a top feed/bottom feed toilet paper sort of argument.
White female, communication studies. What I consider "average" when it comes to unique identifying factors for scholarships.
Communication studies. I want to be a professor. What kinds of companies offer scholarships? Do they typically come with a contract to work for them during/after your degree?

I am a TA for my assistantship and I am teaching my own section of a basic communication studies course for the upcoming year. It is fun I have learned more than I ever thought possible, but it just doesn't quite pay the bills.
